title: Drawing, "Richard H. Mandel House: Sketch", 1933–35
medium: Graphite, dark green crayon, light green crayon on white wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower center: BED ROOM GARAGE/BATH DRES/ROOM KITCHEN MAID BATH MAID STAIRS SHOP/ LIBRARY/13x20 DINING/ROOM/LIVING/ROOM/ 22x30; at middle right: Vegatable garden; at lower right: W/S/N/E/Retainingwall/50' drop; at lower margin: middle
description: Drawing of Mandel residence with floor plan below. Driveway winds toward house from below, and through archway in house at right. Garage and shop at far right; vegetable garden to right of garage. Two maid's quarters and bath at left of garage. In main house, bedroom at west (according to coordinates on drawing); kitchen and dining room at north; living room at east, and library and bathroom at south. Retaining wall at far north edge. Perspective drawing of exterior showing landscaping around property.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Richard H. Mandel House: Sketch", 1933–35.
1933–35. Graphite, dark green crayon, light green crayon on white wove paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-233.
